name: Tiny Sky Planet
description:
A simple shoot and bang arcade game. Player plays as pilots dispatched to defend against an invasion on this cute tiny planet that is filled with water.

How many pilots do you have to sacrifice in order to fight off the invasion?!

Instructions

Use Arrow keys or WASD or XBOX controller D-pad to MOVE. Spacebar or XBOX controller button A to SHOOT.

Best played fullscreen!

Technicals
  • Made with Construct 3 game engine (https://www.construct.net/)
  • Sprites made in Aseprite (https://www.aseprite.org/)
  • Sound Fx made in Chiptone by SFB games (http://sfbgames.com/chiptone/)

P.S. Project file is provided below! Open in Construct 3 r128 beta +
